lines.text:
[to Victoria/Karin]
Is there something going on in that funny little head of yours - something you're keeping from me?

[to Victoria/Karin]
The trouble with you is you really don't know how to relax.
Everything will be all right, Margaret. I'll be your witness.
My conscience will be my witness, Mrs. Spender.
You think it's easy to kill somebody? It takes time and patience and a strong stomach.
